parameters.name: JaggedOutline
parameters.description: True to use a jagged outline, false to not; only valid if NoOutline is false

parameters.name: NoOutline
parameters.description: True to not show an outline, false to show an outline

parameters.name: ShapeIntensity
parameters.description: Shape intensity of the jagged outline; valid range is 1 (most) to 5 (least); only valid if JaggedOutline is true

title: IView.Crop2
description: Crops this view using the selected closed sketch profile.
signature:
System.Int32 Crop2( 
   System.Boolean
JaggedOutline
,
   System.Boolean
NoOutline
,
   System.Int32
ShapeIntensity
)

parameters.name: JaggedOutline
parameters.description: True to use a jagged outline, false to not; only valid if NoOutline is false

parameters.name: NoOutline
parameters.description: True to not show an outline, false to show an outline

parameters.name: ShapeIntensity
parameters.description: Shape intensity of the jagged outline; valid range is 1 (most) to 5 (least); only valid if JaggedOutline is true

returns: Crop view status as defined in swCropViewErrors_e

examples.title: Crop Drawing View Using Jagged Outline (C#)
Crop Drawing View Using Jagged Outline (VB.NET)
